name: Creative your dream!◆ GROOVE S.E
description:
Realize your dream games and music!
GROOVE S.E connects fans with creators.

This is a music arcade game with music and illustrations provided by creator artists.

Enjoy original music and illustrations the creator artists made through the game and become a fan of them through various mini-games.

Give us a cheer and try to participate in game creation.
※ For certain number of songs or more, we will create original game app. for free only by creator artists.

◆ Characteristics of Paid Version
- Play benefits for precedent mini-games.
- Some paid songs are provided for free.
- Heart charging time was shortened from 5 minutes to 59 Sec.
- Advertising banners are removed.
- All paid normal,hard levels are free.
- New music preceding release

◆ About game
There are three modes in the game (modes to be added).
①Keyboard mode: Press when falling cubic and keyboard are crossed.
②Catch Mode : In Catch Mode, the objective is to catch the falling fruits and items through 'TAP' and moving left or right.
③Tap mode : The objective of the TAP mode is to 'tap' or 'hold' when the timeline moving up and down overlaps with the cubics.

We also provide information on various musics and connections between artists and fans, such as enabling presenting artists' image and music through mission.

◆All users are welcomed to participate in the game.
Send your own music, whether you are an individual composer, an indi-band or Hatsune Miku composer,
..and an illustration image. We will register them into the game after a simple check.
※ Free sources of music are provided from copyright music held by our company.
※ Only listening in game is possible due to i-phone features.
※ Developing tools(background creator, music score creator) for PC are to be released in order.
